properties.name: lang
properties.description: String. BCP 47 code. Language to be used in the datepicker for month names and weekday labels. Can be set globally with $root.locale. This property overrides global setting

properties.name: fullWidth
properties.description: Set up full width of datepicker

properties.name: isMobile
properties.description: Responsible for displaying mobile view when set as true

properties.name: secondDate
properties.description: Second date for select and creating a date range

properties.name: selectDayList
properties.description: Allowed display on desktop version of datepicker sidebar on right side with list days for select of date range

properties.name: dateUnset
properties.description: Responsible for unset date status of datepicker
